com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise.predefinedCompounds

Class ApplicationStateModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise.api.SPRComponent
      • com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise.api.Module
        • com.kuka.roboticsAPI.controllerModel.sunrise.predefinedCompounds.ApplicationStateModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IExpressionSegment, ISprComponent, ISegment

    public class ApplicationStateModule
extends Module
    Module that provides the information about application states for the data flow.
    This element is an undocumented internal feature. It is not intended to be used by applications as it might change or be removed in future versions.

      Module parameter used for the declaration of additional stop request InPorts by using {P,S} [0..n], concatenated in a string, where "P" corresponds to a pausing stop request DFE input, and "S" to a normal stop request without pause.

    • Field Detail

      • APPLICATION_STATE_COMPOUND_INSTANCE_NAME

        public static final String APPLICATION_STATE_COMPOUND_INSTANCE_NAME
        The application state SSR compound instance name.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • PARAMETER_EXTRA_STOP_REQ_PORTS

        public static final String PARAMETER_EXTRA_STOP_REQ_PORTS
        Module parameter used for the declaration of additional stop request InPorts by using {P,S} [0..n], concatenated in a string, where "P" corresponds to a pausing stop request DFE input, and "S" to a normal stop request without pause.

        Example: "PSP" corresponds to the following setup (assuming that the ports below are defined):

      • DFE-IN: additionalStopRequest0 (triggers a pause)
      • DFE-IN: additionalStopRequest1 (does not trigger a pause)
      • DFE-IN: additionalStopRequest2 (triggers a pause)
See Also:
Constant Field Values

  • ADDITIONAL_STOP_REQUEST_INPORT_NAME

    public static final String ADDITIONAL_STOP_REQUEST_INPORT_NAME
    Specifies the name root of the InPorts used for the mapping of additional stop requests DFEs. The actual port name consist of this root appended by an index starting from "0".

    It is imperative to set the parameter "ExtraStopReqPorts" accordingly.

    See Also:
    Constant Field Values

    • checkResumeAnswer

      public static boolean checkResumeAnswer(Message answer)
      Checks the answer to a "MotionResume" request SSR.
      Parameters:
      answer - Message containing the answer.
      Returns:
      true, when the message could be processed without errors, AND the module has reported a successful transition to state Running, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - on TRANSITION_DOES_NOT_EXIST_ERROR
